summary: All requirements have been implemented. The backend provides video storage with metadata (REQ-1), the frontend displays a video gallery with thumbnails and titles (REQ-2), direct in-browser playback with standard controls is functional (REQ-3), an upload interface with drag-and-drop and progress tracking exists (REQ-4), and a wedding-themed design with warm colors and elegant typography is applied (REQ-5). No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.
